#summary This page provides help for Developers to customize the template according to their business requirements.
= Developers !RoadMap =

The following links will help a Developer understand and customize the template.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme/wiki/CodeStructure Code Structure]
    * This explains the code structure of the solution.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme/wiki/SiteFeatures Site Features]
    * This explains the site features within the solution

  * [http://code.google.com/p/free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme/wiki/ContentTypes_PageLayouts Custom Content Type and Page Layouts]
    * This explains the Custom Content Type and Page Layouts used in the code.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme/wiki/QueryUsWPDev Query Us Web Part (using Configuration List)]
    * This explains the Query Us webpart and its configuration in the configuration list.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme/wiki/LocationWebpartDev Location Web Part]
    * This explains the configuraation and customization of Location webpart.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme/wiki/ServicesOfferedWebPartDev Service offered WebPart (using Picture library)]
    * This explains the configuraation and customization of Services Offered by the company.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme/wiki/ContactUsAddressWebPartDev Contact Us (Address) WebPart]
    * This explains the configuraation and customization of Location details of the organization.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme/wiki/UserControlsDev Contact Us Header control and Footer Control using Configuration List]
    * This explains the configuration of the Header and footer control used in the site.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme/wiki/SiteElementsDev Master Page, JavaScript, Theme & CSS Class] 
    * This explains the usage of Master Page, !JavaScript, Theme and CSS in the solution.
